summary: The RaceMenu preset for my current Nord character, Sylvanna. I'm pretty proud of how she turned out, so I thought I'd share.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=2]Sylvanna is a young, strong Nord woman that I created for my new personal playthrough. As someone who loves hardcore roleplaying and immersion with mods like iNeed, Frostfall and Hunterborn, I imagined her as a hunter-type character, with her primary skills being Archery, Light Armor and Dagger-One-Handed, but of course you're free to play her however you like. I envisioned her as a person who has been through a lot and has experienced a lot of struggle and tragedies in her life, hence the scars and her reserved facial expression - but hey, just like the playstyle, her backstory is ultimately also up to you, so I won't bore you with the one I developed. When designing her appearance, I drew a lot of inspiration and help from the fantastic RaceMenu presets by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/6540414/?tb=mods&pUp=1]StephieRawx[/url], be sure to check them out if you're looking for other beautiful characters.[/size]


[color=#00ff00][size=4][b]
Required mods:[/b][/size][/color]

[size=3][url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]SKSE[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]RaceMenu[/url] by expired6978

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?]The Eyes Of Beauty[/url] by LogRaam
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35327/?]SG Female Eyebrows[/url] by hellosanta
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7127/?]RANs HeadMesh Variants[/url] by RAN46
(you will need the type C headmesh if you want her to look like in the screenshots, or the round-faced headmesh if you want a slightly rounder face)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?]KS Hairdos - Renewal[/url] by Kalilies

If you want the freckles:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52841/?]Freckle Mania[/url] by tetrodoxin

If you want the face scars:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24600/?]XCE - Scarface[/url] by Xenius
(The scars I use are a combination of vanilla scars and scars from this mod.[/size]

[size=3]
[color=#ff0000]Her ultimate appearance will of course be dependent on what other visual mods you have installed, e.g. body replacers, face and body textures, ENBs, etc.[/color]
In the screenshots, I use [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]CBBE[/url] (the slim body preset), [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/?]SG Female Textures Renewal[/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73937/?]Vivid Weathers[/url] with the corresponding ENB files.


[color=#00ff00][size=4][b]Installation:

[/b][color=#ffffff][size=3]Simply install using NMM, or manually place the Sylvanna.jslot[/size][/color][color=#ffffff][size=3] file into Skyrim/Data/SKSE/Plugins/Chargen/Presets.


[size=3][color=#00ff00][size=4][b]Usage:[/b][/size][/color][/size]

To open up the character creation menu mid-game, open the console and type in "showracemenu" (without quotation marks).
Once you're in, set your race to Nord and your sex to female, then clickÂ  "Presets" at the top right of the RaceMenu, and hit F9 to bring up all saved presets. If you installed correctly, "Sylvanna.jslot" (without quotation marks) should show up in this list, simply select it, hit R to finish your character, and you're golden!
[size=4]


Feel free to upload screenshots of your Sylvanna, I'm a total screenshot noob and the pics at the top were the best I could make :3[/size][size=5][/size][/size][/color][b][size=5]

Enjoy!
[/size]
[/b][/size][/color][/size][/center][color=#b6b6b6][size=4][b]
[/b][/size][/color]
author: Stormblood
